messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

windows check for updates is taking too time sent wednesday check for updates taking too importance high hi monday was leave yesterday have updated policy with executed command window after signed out signed have started check for update process but check for update dialog seem resolve update packages for have attached print screen also restarted computer checked for updates but got same result please investigate why cannot update thank you best regards
